sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export class AdditionalExperiences extends React.Component { render() { return (
additional experiences
1-2-3 Go Driving Academy
director of technology
january 2022 - present
As the Director of Technology at 1-2-3 Go Driving Academy, I am instrumental in enhancing the organization's technological infrastructure and online presence. I designed and built the website and enterprise tech stack, which resulted in an impressive 87% decrease in time-to-enrollment. Leveraging SEO, organic, and paid social strategies, I drove a 318% increase in website and applicant portal traffic. I implemented and enforce a robust security protocol for student and staff data, ensuring compliance with industry standards and achieving 100% secure handling of sensitive information. My leadership in branding efforts significantly boosted brand recognition and market presence, resulting in over 3,000 site visits per month. Through strategic branding, website development, email campaigns, and the creation of an applicant portal, I optimized the enrollment process and contributed to the academy's overall success.
Excellence Project
board member & marketing chair
june 2021 - present
Aid in steering of marketing activities/events including outreach, fundraising, programing, and branding promoting expected program retention
Park at Wellspoint
board member & president
january 2021 - present
Ensuring community’s success and image by maintaining assets, solving issues, and leading improvement projects
IBM
austin black brg design & communications officer
january 2024 - july 2024
Coordinate with our programming and service chairs to design event flyers and market to BRG members by creating inciting Slack and email communications promoting event registration and reminding registered attendees
IBM
intern site supervisor
summer 2023, summer 2024
Onboarded close to 100 interns, planned on and offsite events, managed a team of 5, and budget to ensure the intern experience was productive and fun.
Baylor Competitive Cyber Security
windows security & policy team lead
fall 2019 - spring 2021
Developed and implemented protocols for DOS based systems for use in competition all while managing security policy templates and standards for the entire team + Led windows team practices and prioritized team and individual’s success
Mu Epsilon chapter of Theta Tau
regent (president)
fall 2019 - spring 2021
Led chapter meetings and executive board, coordinated event planning, recruitment, and community engagement
); } }
